WFAPI::MapLibNetworkContext

WFAPI::MapLibNetworkContext Class Reference

#include <MapLibNetworkContext.h>

List of all members.

Public Member Functions

virtual DBufConnection * getConnection ()=0
virtual ~MapLibNetworkContext ()

Detailed Description

Represents a network context that can supply a buffer connection. This connection can be used by MapLib to download maps.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

Virtual destructor.

Member Function Documentation

virtual DBufConnection* WFAPI::MapLibNetworkContext::getConnection (  )  [pure virtual]

Returns a buffer connection that can be used by MapLib to download maps.

Returns:
A buffer connection.
